trans-unit.source: These orders have at least one unconfirmed operation with a planned end date in the past.

seg-source.mrk: These orders have at least one unconfirmed operation with a planned end date in the past.

target.mrk: これらの指図には、計画終了日付が過去である少なくとも 1 つの未確認作業があります。

trans-unit.source: This card shows you how many maintenance orders have at least one unconfirmed operation with a planned end date in the past 6 months. This means that completion of the operation is still awaiting confirmation.

seg-source.mrk: This card shows you how many maintenance orders have at least one unconfirmed operation with a planned end date in the past 6 months.
This means that completion of the operation is still awaiting confirmation.

target.mrk: このカードでは、計画終了日付が過去 6 カ月以内である未確認作業を少なくとも 1 つ含む保全指図の数が示されます。
これは、作業の完了が確認を待っている状態であることを意味します。

trans-unit.source: The orders are sorted by processing status. The processing status for an order is set according to the lowest processing status of its order operations. For example, if an order has several order operations with a planned end date in the past, and one operation has the processing status <uicontrol>Due</uicontrol>, the processing status for the order is <uicontrol>Due</uicontrol>.

seg-source.mrk: The orders are sorted by processing status.
The processing status for an order is set according to the lowest processing status of its order operations.

For example, if an order has several order operations with a planned end date in the past, and one operation has the processing status <uicontrol>Due</uicontrol>, the processing status for the order is <uicontrol>Due</uicontrol>.

target.mrk: 指図は処理ステータス別にソートされます。
指図の処理ステータスは、指図作業の最下位の処理ステータスに応じて設定されます。
たとえば、指図に計画終了日付が過去である複数の指図作業が含まれている場合で、作業に処理ステータス<uicontrol>期限</uicontrol>が含まれている場合、指図の処理ステータスは<uicontrol>期限</uicontrol>です。

trans-unit.source: Click the card header to see all unconfirmed orders and operations with a planned end date in the past 6 months.

seg-source.mrk: Click the card header to see all unconfirmed orders and operations with a planned end date in the past 6 months.

target.mrk: カードヘッダをクリックして、計画終了日付が過去 6 カ月以内のすべての未確認指図および作業を表示します。

trans-unit.source: Click a section in the chart to see unconfirmed orders and operations that have a specific processing status.

seg-source.mrk: Click a section in the chart to see unconfirmed orders and operations that have a specific processing status.

target.mrk: チャートのセクションをクリックし、特定の処理ステータスの未確認指図および作業を表示します。

trans-unit.source: If this card is not relevant for you, you can hide it. To do so, open the user actions menu in the top-left corner of the screen and click <uicontrol>Manage Cards</uicontrol>.

seg-source.mrk: If this card is not relevant for you, you can hide it.
To do so, open the user actions menu in the top-left corner of the screen and click <uicontrol>Manage Cards</uicontrol>.

target.mrk: このカードが関連しない場合は、非表示にすることができます。
これを行うには、画面の左上隅にあるユーザアクションメニューを開き、<uicontrol>カードの管理</uicontrol>をクリックします。
